      protected int Grid.getDistanceToGoal​(Point point)
      This method computes the distance between a point and the goal in hops, independently of the presence of obstacles.
      protected int Grid.getStepCost​(Point origin, Point destination)
      This method computes the cost of a step in the grid, according to the grid costs.
      protected java.lang.Integer[] Grid.getValidMoves​(Point indPosition)
      This method retrieves the possible moves from a position given as input.
      private boolean Grid.isObstacle​(Point point)
      This method tells if a given point in the grid is an obstacle.

      Setter for the visited table as true.
      protected void Individual.updateCost​(Point origin, Point destination)
      This method updates the cost of the individual by adding the cost of a step to the previous cost.
